address: Xã Măng Cành, Huyện Kon Plông, Tỉnh Kon Tum
thought:
**Analysis of Address Transformation: "Xã Măng Cành"**

Okay, here's how I'm approaching this address mapping. The user wants to find the new administrative unit for "Xã Măng Cành," which is in "Huyện Kon Plông", "Tỉnh Kon Tum" based on resolutions and new ward data.

First, I identified the old administrative components: ward, district, and province. My initial observation is that the district ("Huyện Kon Plông") isn't a primary focus based on the prompt's instruction to "eliminate all districts", so I'll keep that information for context but prioritize the ward and province mapping.

Next, I delved into the province-level changes. Resolution 60-NQ/TW is key here. I checked if "Tỉnh Kon Tum" was subject to any administrative reorganization. It turns out "Tỉnh Kon Tum" *was* merged, becoming part of "Tỉnh Quảng Ngãi" based on this resolution. That significantly changes the scope of the mapping.

Then, I looked at other resolutions, particularly 1677/NQ-UBTVQH15, concerning the adjustment of administrative units in "Tỉnh Quảng Ngãi." This is where the magic happens. I found a direct reference to "Xã Măng Cành" within the resolution. Line 79 explicitly states that "Xã Măng Cành" will be merged into a new ward called "Xã Măng Đen." This provides a definitive link.

To ensure consistency, I looked at the new ward data. I confirmed the existence of "Xã Măng Đen" in "Tỉnh Quảng Ngãi" with the associated code "23473."  I also found "Xã Kon Plông," which is interesting since the original address contained "Huyện Kon Plông" but, with the explicit mention of "Xã Măng Cành" merging into "Xã Măng Đen", this confirms the confidence of this finding.

Based on this analysis, I'm confident in the following mapping: "Xã Măng Cành" (old) maps to "Xã Măng Đen" (new), which is located in the new province of "Tỉnh Quảng Ngãi." The confidence level is high because of the explicit mapping outlined in the resolution and the validation with the new ward data.

citation.header: 1677/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Quảng Ngãi
citation.line: 79. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của thị trấn Măng Đen, xã Măng Cành và xã Đăk Tăng thành xã mới có tên gọi là xã Măng Đen.
